name: Payment Gateway for PayUmoney Latam on Easy Digital Downloads
author: WP ALL SUPPORT

sections.description:
PayUmoney latam gateway supports USD, COP, MXN, ARS, PEN, BRL, CLP currencies.

After checkout on the website it redirects the user to the PayUmoney latam payment screen where the customer can make the payment.

The plugin requires a test key or live API key which can be found from your PayUmoney latam account settings at https://payulatam.com/

This add on is 100% translatable.

More plugins by WP ALL SUPPORT

Hide WP Admin Bar by WP ALL SUPPORT – Hide admin bar based on user roles and conditional logic
PayUmoney – PayUmoney payment gateway for Easy Digital Downloads

If you find any bug, please report it in the support forum and we will fix it asap!

Suggestions / Feature Request

If you have suggestions or a new feature request, feel free to get in touch with me via the contact form on our website here
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/edd-payu-latam-gateway directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly (recommended).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Enter your API keys and choose test-mode for making test payments
  4. Visit the Easy Digital Downlads payment gateway settings and select the Payment gateways you want to activate in your checkout page.
  5. Select the payment icons you want to be visible on the checkout page.
sections.faq:
What Do I Need To Use The Plugin

  1. You need to have Easy Digital Downloads plugin installed and activated on your WordPress site.
  2. You need to open a PayUmoney latam merchant account on PayUmoney latam

short_description: This is a simple addon for the Easy Digital Downloads WordPress plugin to use the PayUmoney latam payment gateway.

The plugin requires a test key or live API key which can be found from your PayUmoney latam account settings at https://payulatam.com/
